News.Title: Shriram Finance Block Trade Worth Rs. 30.31 Crores
News.Summary: Shriram Finance executed a significant NSE block trade valued at Rs. 30.31 crores, involving approximately 300,390 shares at Rs. 1008.90 per share.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Receives Rs 46.91 Lakh GST Penalty
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited received a penalty order of Rs 46,91,115 from Commercial Tax Officer, Chennai South for FY 2022-23 related to erstwhile Shriram City Union Finance Limited operations.

News.Title: Shriram Finance schedules investor conference Feb 4
News.Summary: Shriram Finance announces participation in ICICI Securities Investor Conference on February 04, 2026, with multiple meetings scheduled with institutional investors and fund managers in Singapore.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Block Trade Worth Rs. 34.47 Crores
News.Summary: Shriram Finance witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 337,902 shares at Rs. 1020.00 per share, totaling Rs. 34.47 crores in transaction value.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Faces GST Penalties Worth ₹1.56 Crore
News.Summary: Shriram Finance receives penalty orders totaling ₹1.56 crore from Tamil Nadu Commercial Tax Officer for GST violations related to erstwhile Shriram City Union Finance for FY 2020-21 and 2021-22.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Reports MSME Segment Slowdown
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Co MD highlights slowdown in specific MSME segments attributed to tariff uncertainty affecting business operations and growth prospects.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets ₹24.06 Cr GST Penalty Order
News.Summary: Shriram Finance received a penalty order of ₹24,06,19,502 from Commercial Tax Officer, Chennai South for FY 2019-20 related to GST violations by erstwhile Shriram City Union Finance.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Board Approves Debt Fundraising Plan
News.Summary: Shriram Finance's board has approved a strategic plan to raise funds through debt securities issuance over a period spanning from February 1 to April 30, 2026, strengthening the company's capital structure.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Q3 Net Profit Drops 29.4% to ₹2,520 Cr
News.Summary: Shriram Finance reported Q3 net profit of ₹2,520 crores, declining 29.4% from ₹3,570 crores in the same quarter last year, though marginally exceeding analyst estimates of ₹2,400 crores.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Sees ₹82.11 Cr NSE Block Trade
News.Summary: Shriram Finance witnessed a significant block trade on NSE worth ₹82.11 crores involving 837,034 shares at ₹981 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity in the stock.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Block Trade Worth ₹16.45 Crores
News.Summary: Shriram Finance executed a significant block trade on NSE involving 163,794 shares at ₹1,004.50 per share, totaling ₹16.45 crores in transaction value.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Sees ₹29.65 Cr NSE Block Trade
News.Summary: Shriram Finance executed a significant block trade on NSE worth ₹29.65 crores involving 295,708 shares at ₹1,002.80 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Q3FY26 Results Call on Jan 23
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited has scheduled a conference call on January 23, 2026 at 7:00 PM IST to discuss Q3FY26 financial results ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Board Meet on Jan 23 for Q3 Results
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited has scheduled a board meeting on January 23, 2026, to approve Q3FY26 financial results and consider resource mobilisation plans for debt securities issuance.

News.Title: Shriram Finance to Announce Q3 Results on Jan 23
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited has scheduled the announcement of its third quarter financial results for January 23, 2025, as part of its regular quarterly disclosure process.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Sees ₹21.17 Cr NSE Block Trade
News.Summary: Shriram Finance witnessed a significant block trade on NSE worth ₹21.17 crores involving 211,643 shares at ₹1000.15 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity in the stock.

News.Title: Shriram Finance EGM Passes All Three Resolutions
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited successfully concluded its Extra-Ordinary General Meeting on January 14, 2026, with shareholders approving all three proposed resolutions including preferential equity issue and special investor rights.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets Shareholder Nod for MUFG Rights
News.Summary: Shriram Finance shareholders have overwhelmingly approved special rights for MUFG under SEBI regulations, strengthening the strategic partnership between the financial institutions.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets Shareholder Nod for MUFG Deal
News.Summary: Shriram Finance shareholders approve three MUFG deal proposals with 98.5% backing share issuance, 99.5% supporting board nominations, and 91.9% approving $200 million trust payment for the $4.4 billion partnership.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets AA+/Watch Positive Rating for FD Programme
News.Summary: CRISIL assigns AA+/Watch Positive rating to Shriram Finance's ₹80,000 crore fixed deposit programme following MUFG Bank's ₹39,618 crore investment announcement. The rating reflects strong capitalisation and market leadership position.

News.Title: Shriram-MUFG Deal Faces Proxy Advisor Pushback
News.Summary: The $4.4 billion cross-border deal receives rating upgrades from Care, Icra, and Moody's, but proxy advisors SES and IiAS oppose key resolutions citing governance concerns over control transfer and non-compete payments.

News.Title: Shriram-MUFG Deal Tests Non-Compete Fee Rules
News.Summary: MUFG's $4.4 billion investment in Shriram Finance includes unusual $200 million non-compete fee to promoters who retain control, raising regulatory questions about equitable treatment of shareholders.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Block Trade Worth ₹46.80 Crores
News.Summary: Shriram Finance witnessed a significant NSE block trade involving 484,439 shares valued at ₹46.80 crores, executed at ₹966.00 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: Moody's upgrades Shriram Finance outlook to positive
News.Summary: Moody's affirms Ba1 rating for Shriram Finance and revises outlook to positive following MUFG Bank's planned ₹396 billion strategic investment for 20% stake, expected to strengthen capital base and funding access.

News.Title: Moody's upgrades Shriram Finance outlook to positive
News.Summary: Moody's revises Shriram Finance outlook from stable to positive while affirming Ba1 rating, following MUFG Bank's planned ₹4.4 billion investment for 20% stake expected to close in 2026.

News.Title: Moody's Upgrades Shriram Finance Outlook to Positive
News.Summary: Moody's affirmed Shriram Finance's Ba1 rating and upgraded outlook to positive following MUFG Bank's ₹39,600 crore investment announcement, strengthening capital base significantly.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Surges 72% in 2025 on MUFG Deal
News.Summary: Shriram Finance delivered 72.40% returns in 2025, driven by MUFG's ₹39,620 crore investment for 20% stake, strong Q2 FY26 earnings growth, and rising AUM of ₹2,81,309.46 crore.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Allots 1.26L Shares Under ESOP
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited has allotted 1,26,275 equity shares to 139 employees under its ESOP scheme at ₹38.71 per share, increasing paid-up capital to ₹376.30 crores.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Sees ₹25.56 Cr NSE Block Trade
News.Summary: Shriram Finance witnessed a significant block trade on NSE worth ₹25.56 crores involving 259,387 shares at ₹985.55 per share, indicating substantial institutional activity.

News.Title: Shriram Finance seeks ₹39,618 cr MUFG funding approval
News.Summary: Shriram Finance EGM on January 14 to vote on ₹39,618 crore capital infusion from MUFG Bank through 20% stake dilution. Three proxy advisors recommend approval of the cross-border investment deal.

News.Title: Shriram Finance gets CARE AAA rating upgrade
News.Summary: CARE Ratings upgraded Shriram Finance's long-term instruments and NCDs to CARE AAA; Stable from CARE AA+; Stable, while reaffirming CARE A1+ rating for commercial paper programme.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Faces ₹13.04 Cr GST Penalty Order
News.Summary: Shriram Finance receives penalty order of ₹13.04 crores from Commercial Tax Officer, Chennai South for FY 2018-19 GST violations related to input tax credit issues.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets AAA Rating Upgrade From CARE
News.Summary: CARE Ratings upgraded Shriram Finance's long-term rating from AA+ to AAA with stable outlook on Dec 29, 2025, following MUFG deal announcement. Motilal Oswal expects similar upgrades from other rating agencies.

News.Title: MCX Shares Rise 3% Near Record High on Morgan Stanley Upgrade
News.Summary: MCX shares surge 3% to Rs 11,198, near 52-week high of Rs 11,218, following Morgan Stanley's upgrade to Equal Weight with 66% target price hike to Rs 11,135 amid strong ADTR momentum.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets AAA Rating for Fixed Deposits
News.Summary: CARE Ratings assigns AAA; Stable rating to Shriram Finance's Fixed Deposit Programme on December 30, 2025, further strengthening the company's credit profile following recent upgrades.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Outlines Growth Strategy Post-MUFG Deal
News.Summary: Shriram Finance management details expansion plans following MUFG's $4.4 billion investment, targeting 18-20% growth with improved ROA of 3.60% and 100 bps cost reduction over two years.

News.Title: Citi Sets Buy Rating on Shriram Finance at ₹1,100
News.Summary: Citigroup has issued a buy recommendation for Shriram Finance with a target price of ₹1,100, indicating positive outlook on the financial services company's prospects.

News.Title: Morgan Stanley Sets ₹925 Target for Shriram Finance
News.Summary: Morgan Stanley maintains overweight rating on Shriram Finance with target price of ₹925, reflecting positive outlook on the financial services company's prospects.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Rules Out Banking License Plans
News.Summary: Shriram Finance executive confirms company has no current discussions about transitioning to banking operations, clarifying market speculation about potential banking license.

News.Title: CLSA Raises Shriram Finance Target to ₹1,030
News.Summary: CLSA maintains Outperform rating on Shriram Finance and raises target price to ₹1,030 from ₹840, indicating strong confidence in the financial services company's prospects.

News.Title: Jefferies Raises Shriram Finance Target to ₹1,080
News.Summary: Jefferies maintains Buy rating on Shriram Finance and raises target price to ₹1,080, reflecting positive outlook on the financial services company.

News.Title: Nomura Raises Shriram Finance Target to ₹1,140
News.Summary: Nomura maintains Buy rating on Shriram Finance and raises target price to ₹1,140, signaling positive outlook for the financial services company.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Gets CRISIL Rating Watch Positive
News.Summary: CRISIL places Shriram Finance's AA+ rating on Watch with Positive Implications following MUFG Bank deal approval. Rating action covers bank facilities and debt instruments worth over ₹1.3 lakh crores.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Block Trade Worth ₹91.17 Crores
News.Summary: Shriram Finance witnessed a significant block trade on NSE involving 1,059,080 shares worth ₹91.17 crores at ₹860.80 per share, indicating institutional activity.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Clarifies MUFG Investment Rumors
News.Summary: Shriram Finance addresses market speculation about MUFG's $5 billion investment for 20% stake, confirming no formal agreement exists. Board meeting scheduled for December 19, 2025 to discuss fundraising plans.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Receives ₹27.71L GST Penalty Order
News.Summary: Shriram Finance Limited received a GST penalty order of ₹27.71 lakh from Uttar Pradesh tax authorities on December 16, 2025, related to violations by erstwhile Shriram City Union Finance Limited.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Clarifies MUFG Investment Rumors
News.Summary: Shriram Finance responds to MUFG $5B investment rumors, confirms no binding agreement exists, board meeting scheduled for December 19, 2025 to discuss fund raising options.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Board to Meet on Dec 19 for Fundraising
News.Summary: Shriram Finance has announced a board meeting scheduled for December 19, 2025, to discuss potential fundraising through equity or securities offerings.

News.Title: MUFG Eyes 20% Stake in Shriram Finance
News.Summary: Japanese financial giant MUFG shows interest in acquiring approximately 20% stake in Shriram Finance, providing more specific details about the previously announced investment plans.

News.Title: Shriram Finance Allots 81,927 Equity Shares Under Employee Stock Option Scheme
News.Summary: Shriram Finance's ESOP Allotment Committee approved the allotment of 81,927 equity shares of Rs. 2 face value each to 113 employees under its Employee Stock Option Scheme 2023. The allotment increased the company's paid-up share capital from Rs. 376,25,60,348 to Rs. 376,27,24,202, with the new shares ranking pari-passu with existing shares.
